Description: Fragment of ovoid handle of handle of perhaps Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-brown. Circular stamp. Analysed.
Curator's comments: For the analysis of such, and especially this stamp see I. Whitbread, Greek Transport Amphoras, London1995, 118-20.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (322)
